objects.specification: A large rectangular classroom floor with a subtle wooden plank texture in an earthy brown tone, smooth finish and slight grain detail for a warm, natural appearance.
A smooth white plaster ceiling with a clean matte finish, creating a neutral backdrop for evenly spaced light fixtures.
A smooth classroom wall painted in a natural earth green tone, with a subtle matte finish for a calm learning environment.
A smooth classroom wall painted in a natural earth green tone, with a subtle matte finish for a calm learning environment.

A large rectangular teacher’s desk with a smooth wood-grain surface, sturdy rectangular legs, integrated modesty panel and a rich warm finish.
A large rectangular chalkboard surface with a dark matte finish, framed by a slim metallic border and designed for clear chalk or marker visibility.
A classic circular wall clock with a slim frame, white face, bold black numerals and simple hands for easy readability.
A tall wooden bookshelf with five evenly spaced shelves, visible wood grain texture, filled with colorful dinosaur-related books and educational materials.
A highly detailed life-size dinosaur skeleton replica with realistic bone textures, articulated joints and impressive scale, showcasing paleontological authenticity.
A glass display case with clear transparent panels, slim metal framing and a sturdy base, designed to showcase fossils or bone specimens.
A glass display case with clear transparent panels, slim metal framing and a sturdy base, designed to showcase fossils or bone specimens.
A lush indoor potted plant with broad green leaves in a textured ceramic pot, adding a touch of nature to the corner.
A modern ceiling-mounted rectangular LED light fixture with a diffused panel and slim profile for even illumination.
